question: 依然
sourceMnemonic:
If you have a <kanji>dependent</kanji> <kanji>nature</kanji>, then even if you go off on your own, you're <vocabulary>still</vocabulary> going to ask for help. Dependent people still need help because that's just how they are.

Note that you need to add <ja>と</ja> to the end of this word to make it an adverb, and <ja>たる</ja> to make it an adjective!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
